tool.name: ISA to netCDF
tool.description: Extract netCDF files from an ISA dataset and output a collection of netCDF dataset.
tool.help:
==================== ISA to netCDF ====================
Extract netCDF files contained inside an ISA archive.
----- Input -----
ISA dataset ===========
The ISA-Tab dataset from which to extract the files.
------ Output ------
The output is a collection of netCDF files.
